content: And I think the second question as far as newbuild versus existing pipelines, if you take a look at our map, really any of the pipes we have could be put in -- most of the pipes we have we put in CO2 service or that's in the gas phase or in the dense phase. And you look at the NGL volumes that you've seen step up on our system, ultimately, I think there's going to be some gives and takes on the petchem side until these things get worked out and for it to work on a more fluid basis.
